com.brogrammers.agora.views

Class CommentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.brogrammers.agora.views.CommentAdapter

  • public class CommentAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Adapter for populating and formatting comments onto comment view
    Author:
    Group02
